definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
squad of five soldiers/to associate with/five (banker's anti-fraud numeral)

sentences.english: The leader had joined the army much earlier after graduating from high school.
sentences.chinese: 這位班長自打高中畢業後就入伍了。

sentences.english: They were called up at the age of nineteen.
sentences.chinese: 他們十九歲時被徵召入伍。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the status of health literary about recruits.
sentences.chinese: 目的掌握入伍新兵健康素養情況。

sentences.english: A few months later my younger brother enlisted as a bugler .
sentences.chinese: 幾個月以後，我弟弟作爲號兵應徵入伍。

sentences.english: He was drafted by the army and served for four years.
Levy Spearmen are common folk from villages and towns that have been levied into the army.
sentences.chinese: 徵召矛兵通常來自於村鎮平民，被徵召入伍參加戰鬥。

sentences.english: He decided to enlist in the Marines.
sentences.chinese: 他決定入伍當美國海軍陸戰隊士兵。

sentences.english: Templates, or the data representing the enrollee 's biometric.
sentences.chinese: 模版或資料入伍青年代表的生物特徵。

sentences.english: To defend their country, many young people of that village joined the army.
sentences.chinese: 爲了保衛祖國，那個村子裏的很多年輕人蔘軍入伍。

sentences.english: When he was in graduate school, he was drafted into the army and sent to fight in China.
sentences.chinese: 讀研究生時，他應徵入伍並被派往中國參戰。

sentences.english: He enlisted for active service in the war.
sentences.chinese: 他在戰爭中入伍服現役。

sentences.english: After graduating from college, forrest gump and enlistment to Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 在大學畢業後，阿甘又應徵入伍去了越南。

sentences.english: Over half the army was composed of conscripts.
sentences.chinese: 軍中一半以上是應徵入伍者。

sentences.english: I was called up three months after war broke out.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭爆發後的第三個月，我被應徵入伍。

sentences.english: I tell you, tomorrow you will be mobilized.
sentences.chinese: 我告訴你們，明天你們就要應徵入伍了。

definition: to be discharged from military service
to serve in the army/to be a soldier
to enlist/to serve in the army
to change one's profession/to transfer to civilian work
